info.game_comments: (Kelly: We're here in wonderful Copenhagen celebrating 200 years of Hans Christian Andersen.  Join us, next on Jeopardy!)

(1, 1).clue: (Kelly of the Clue Crew reads from the statue of The Little Mermaid in Copenhagen, Denmark.)  In the original story, the prince never knew how much the Little Mermaid loved him because the Sea Witch had taken this away
